Package cs2030.simulator

Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs2030.simulator.Customer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GreedyCustomer
    class Customer
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a Customer. A Customer has a status and an Event associated with it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Customer

        Customer​(int id,
         int status,
         double time)
        Creates a Customer with an Id,status, time.
        Parameters:
        id - Identification of Customer.
        status - Status is his most recent activity, i.e. arrival, wait, serve, done or leave.
        time - Time of his most recent activity, i.e. arrival, wait, serve, done or leave.

    • Method Detail

      • setStatus

        Customer setStatus​(int nextStatus,
                   double nextTime)
        Sets status of Customer and time to nextStatus and nextTime.
        Parameters:
        nextStatus - next Status of Customer.
        nextTime - Time of Customer's most recent activity.
        Returns:
        Customer with updated time and status.

      • findServer

        Server findServer​(java.util.List<Server> servers,
                  java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.List<Customer>> queue,
                  int limit)
        Finds the first server whose queue is not full.
        Parameters:
        servers - List of Servers.
        queue - All queues in the store.
        limit - Maximum queue length
        Returns:
        First server whose queue is not full, null if all are full.
